reviews.review_msg: very very amusing...and excellent at explaning course material

Great prof, first term was killer, second about the same, final not much easier. I had fun in this class his method is good, he encourages questions at all times and rewards class attendance by telling what a nice exam question would be. This class is no joke if you don't study you will likely fail. Pretty funny guy always making jokes. I recommend

Does not know how to teach. Expects graduate level knowledge and quizzes on obscure facts from error-riddled powerpoint slides. Does not provide enough practice questions to prepare for quizes/tests. She posted a lecture tutorial with no audio and instead of recording again explaining herself, she posted it and said to treat it like a silent movie.
no organization or syllabus, terrible marker, will quiz you on obscure facts. Avoid if possible.

When I took this class a couple years ago she READ examples off an old textbook while assigning the class a different one. She couldn't even be bothered to make a slide or write anything on the board. Would not take another class with her again

Corina is a nice professor. She is very accessible, despite of her tough appearance. The class in general is very easy. If you complete and understand the homework, it's not a stressful course. Use the office hour to ask for help if you have questions as having a clear understanding of the previous material will help you greatly with new concepts.

Very Good Prof! She explained everything very well, and if you go to class, and at least pay attention to her to some degree, you should do alright.  Obviously, the course is tough due to the material, but overall she does a good job of easing you into it.
She is very nice either in class or in office. If you want to learn nuclear science, take with her. Would  take other courses with her

For this class you will need a textbook to do well, you can't sit back and be a bozo and expect everything to go your way. As long as you do your work and are interested in the material it is an easy A or A+

Awful professors. Tries to get away with doing nothing, doesn't answer emails. NO organization, the notes are terrible and she tells you they will suffice for the midterms. You basically have to learn everything yourself!
good but final mark will be very low.
Dr. Roshea is very accessible outside of class, clear grading criteria and very caring.
